entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023
